io.werval.api.http

Interface Session


  • public interface Session
    Session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods

      Clear all Session values.

    • Method Detail

      • hasChanged

        boolean hasChanged()
        Check if the Session has changed.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the Session has changed, FALSE otherwise

      • has

        boolean has(String key)
        Check if the Session has a value for a key.
        Parameters:
        key - Session key
        Returns:
        TRUE if the Session has a value for the given key

      • get

        String get(String key)
        Get a Session value.
        Parameters:
        key - Session key
        Returns:
        Session value for the given key, null if absent

      • set

        void set(String key,
         String value)
        Set a Session value.
        Parameters:
        key - Session key
        value - Session value

      • remove

        String remove(String key)
        Remove a value from the Session.
        Parameters:
        key - Session key
        Returns:
        Returns the value to which this Session previously associated the key, or null if the Session contained no value for the key.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear all Session values.

      • asMap

        Map<String,String> asMap()
        Returns:
        A Map copy of the Session values

      • signedCookie

        Cookies.Cookie signedCookie()
        Returns:
        Signed Session Cookie
